english: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to go on the rampage/to riot/to run amuck

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to overflow/transverse flow/to flow over/cross flow
to grow without restraint/overflowing with/to happen unexpectedly
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
horizontal traverse/to cut across/to cross transversally
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
